description: Multiply perfect numbers whose average divisor is (a) not an integer and (b) does not divide the number itself.
formula: a=s1/s0, b=x/a, c=s1/x, where s1 is the sum and s0 is the number of divisors of x. Here only c is an integer, while a and b are not.
example: x=523776,number of divisors is 80, Sigma[ 1,523776 ]=1571328 and the relevant quotients are: a=19641.6, b=26.667, c=3(integer).
author: _Labos Elemer_
